description: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record. The CLM_NOTE table holds claim level notes or remarks.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the Claim Info record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CLM_NOTE
columns.description: This item holds claim level notes.
